issue.title: [C++] Provide ArrayBuilder::AppendScalar
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11932](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11932). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be useful to be able to append a Scalar (and/or ScalarVector) to an ArrayBuilder. For example, in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9621#discussion_r587461083 (ARROW-11591) this could be used to accumulate an array of expected grouped aggregation results using existing scalar aggregate kernels
